name: Black Court
description:
Summary

Play as Harry Dresden as he fights his way through the streets of his home city to protect the peace and defeat the newly instated vampire nest that has ingrained its way into his home. Run, jump, and magic your way to victory in this 2D action platformer set in the noir streets of Chicago.

Instructions
  • A and D to move
  • W and Space to jump
  • Left Mouse Button to attack
  • Shift to dash
